items.title: Amex Announces Filing of Updated MRE Technical Report for the Perron Project
items.description: Montreal, Quebec--(Newsfile Corp. - July 7, 2025) - Amex Exploration Inc. (TSXV: AMX) (FSE: MX0) (OTCQX: AMXEF) ("Amex" or "the Company") is pleased to announce that it has filed a National Instrument 43-101 Standards of Disclosure for Mineral Projects ("NI 43-101") Updated Mineral Resource Estimate ("MRE") Technical Report for AMEX's 100% owned Perron Gold Project in Quebec, Canada, with an effective date of May 21, 2025 (the "Report"). Report results were previously announced in AMEX's news re
